original_text: And when Saul saw that he had great success, he stood in fearful awe of him.
korean_text: 사울은 다윗이 크게 지혜롭게 행함을 보고 그를 두려워하였으나

sentences.original_text: And when Saul saw that he had great success
sentences.korean_translation: 사울이 그가 큰 성공을 거두는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: he stood in fearful awe of him.
